name: Ghost Goes Home
description:
Get home

You're a ghost who is traveling back home. Somewhere along the road, you became lost, and are surrounded by bats that are out to get you. To find your way back home, you need to collect 10 silver coins. But watch out, if you get hit four times, you won't make it home....ever. So be careful and goodluck!

Controls
  • Fly up and down using the arrow keys
  • Click the 'Play' button to start the game
  • Click the 'Exit' button at any point to quit
Features
  • 2D Side-Scolling game
  • Pixel art style
  • Coin collecting
  • Flying bat obstacles
  • Open-source music by www.bensound.com 
  • Open source art by ansimuz.com and Clint Bellanger for Liberated Pixel Art
  • Open-source sounds by freesound.org
